title: Pui-caa successfully removing access to multiple cases for multiple solicitors in their org (happy path)
specs: U1 - with a solicitor role in a particular jurisdiction within an organisation, to create a case
U2 - with a pui-caa role within the same organisation to assign and unassign access to a case for a solicitor in their organisation
U3 - with a solicitor role for the same jurisdiction within the same organisation, to get assigned and unassigned access to a case
is made by U2 and intends to unassign access to C1, C2 and C3 for U1 & U3
